pages.text: The Voodoo Poppet is probably the most interesting poppet in this book. It allows its creator to influence another player in multiple different ways. $(br)In order for this to work you will need to combine a normal poppet with leads, spider eyes and an enderpearl. If done correctly this will make it possible to create a strong binding to another player.
Once a binding is established this will make it possible to inflict harm on the bound player and even to fling them around.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: You can use the Voodoo Poppet in 4 different ways: $(li)You can sting needles into the poppet. This will inflict minor damage to the target. $(li)You can push the target into any direction you want. Even from a large distance. $(li)You can throw the poppet underwater. This will cause the target to slowly drown. $(li)You can throw the poppet into fire. While the poppet will slowly burn away it will cause significant harm to the target.

You can use needles by holding the poppet in you main hand, a needle in you offhand and then holding and after a few seconds releasing the right mouse button. $(br)If you do the same without a needle in you offhand you will instead push the target around. $(br)$(c)$(l)Important$()$(br)If the target has a $(l:poppets/voodoo_protection_poppet)Voodoo Protection Poppet$(/l) bound to them it will destroy this poppet when activated.
